title: What are newspaper editors using?
content: What are all the major news paper editors using for newspaper layout? InDesign? Quark? Others?
author: jroden144

comments.content:
I noticed the existence of that system last week, based on a "looklike Xpress" appl   
 [http://www.mileniumcrossmedia.com/en/Milenium/Mileniumdesig.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018215608/http:/www.mileniumcrossmedia.com/en/Milenium/Mileniumdesig.htm)   
   
but in fact a sort of front end of a largedatabase system.   
   
What is surprise me a lot, is the system still not unicode (from the infos I get from clients), and require only TrueType.

I would suggest taking a peak at the PDFs available from the [Newseum](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018215608/http:/www.newseum.org/todaysfrontpages/) site, and getting the document properties to tell you what application created it, and which custom faces were used if you are into it.
